title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is a professional makeup painting kit for face and body. It has 20 colors in one sturdy plastic case. The texture is creamy and intensive pigmented, with flash and Aqua type colors. Example colors include gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. You can use sponge or brush to apply.

The formula is oil-based, non-toxic, and gentle to skin. Colors blend easy, feel comfortable, and look vibrant. It dries quick, becomes smudge-proof, and is durable with minimal rub-off. Coverage is color-saturated, good for details or large area painting. It is flexible and crack resistant for long time wear.

This palette is suitable for kids and adults. It works for Halloween, festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, SFX makeup, stage performances, cosplay, and daily artist practice. You can create many looks, like crown, costume, bruise, blood, and other special effects or artistic makeup.

To remove, use olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover, then wash the skin clean. The case is convenient to carry and store. Good choice for party makeup, FX work, and artists who need reliable, bright colors in one palette.
